Value: PRISM is a BIDS-inspired validator and metadata framework for psychological experiment datasets. It validates dataset structure and rich JSON sidecar metadata (surveys, biometrics) and provides a web UI and CLI for dataset validation and conversion.

We produce official signed builds for distribution to research IT departments and users. Signed binaries reduce SmartScreen/Defender blocking and increase deployability across institutions. We are an OSI-licensed open-source project (AGPL-3.0) and integrate with SignPath in CI to automatically sign release artifacts when secrets are available.
Distribution to research groups and institutes, official releases on GitHub Releases, support for IT department deployment policies

Contributors have provided written consent for relicensing (RELICENSE_AGREEMENT.md in repo). We will add SignPath secrets to GitHub once approved and are happy to provide any additional verification documents.
